CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 基因；遗传物质；遗传因子；遗传单元；（Gene）吉恩（男子名）

word_group.brief_definition: 基因沉默；切断基因显现
基因重排；重排基因；基因的重排
疾病基因；致病基因；病基因

bilingual.source: The intergenic sequences can play a role in gene regulation.
bilingual.target: 基因间的序列可能在基因调控中起作用。

bilingual.source: A gene mutation can lead to diseases.
bilingual.target: 基因突变可能导致疾病。
甲基化可以改变基因表达。

bilingual.source: Mutations in intergenic areas can sometimes affect gene expression.
bilingual.target: 基因间的区域中的突变有时会影响基因表达。

bilingual.source: Scientists are studying the role of gtf in gene expression.
bilingual.target: 科学家们正在研究基因转录因子在基因表达中的作用。
甲基化可以影响基因表达。
他们发现了一种新的基因突变。

bilingual.source: The heterozygote carries two different alleles for a specific gene.
bilingual.target: 杂合子携带一个特定基因的两个不同等位基因。
基因突变可能导致遗传疾病。

bilingual.source: This disease is caused by a recessive gene.
bilingual.target: 这种疾病是由隐性基因引起的。

yingyinNormal.en: It's a gene. Well, it's sort of two genes, but two genes that are identical.
yingyinNormal.zh: 基因问题。是两种基因。完全相同的基因。

yingyinNormal.en: Personalized genomic massage anyone? There's already a lab today that tests for allele 334 of the AVPR1 gene, the so-called cheating gene.
yingyinNormal.zh: 有人想要个人定制的基因学按摩吗？如今已经有个实验室为AVPR1基因上的等位基因334测序，所谓的欺骗基因。

yingyinNormal.en: While we all have the gene, such as BRCA1, that can cause cancer, it's only when these genes fail at their function that problems develop.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们每个人身体里都有诸如乳腺癌1号基因这类可能导致癌症的基因存在，但癌症只会发生在这些基因失效时。

yingyinNormal.en: You have two copies of the BRCA1 gene in every cell of your body.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在你身体的每个细胞内，乳腺癌1号基因有两个副本。

yingyinNormal.en: Did you know my company is developing a gene that will prolong a person's life?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你知道我的公司在研究延长寿命的基因吗？

yingyinNormal.en: One of these genes is BRCA1, which stands for breast cancer susceptibility gene 1.
yingyinNormal.zh: 其中一个叫做BRCA1，就是”乳腺癌1号基因”。

yingyinNormal.en: And the trouble is that both of my parents carry the gene at the same time, which is...
yingyinNormal.zh: 但问题是我的父母同时携带了这种基因，这样就……

yingyinNormal.en: The good news? Our advances in gene splicing have opened up a whole new frontier.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好消息是？我们在基因融合领域的改进已经开辟了一个新的前沿。

yingyinNormal.en: Several million years ago, a gene plague caused by cloning nearly annihilated the entire human race.
yingyinNormal.zh: 几百万年前尤克隆导致的基因灾祸几乎使整个人类都灭绝了。

yingyinNormal.en: If you have this deleterious mutation in this gene, you're 90 percent likely to get cancer in your life.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果这个基因发生有害突变，就有百分之九十的可能患癌。

yingyinNormal.en: And what they find is a single-point mutation in a gene responsible for controlling programmed cell death.
yingyinNormal.zh: 然后他们在控制程序性细胞死亡的基因上发现一个单点突变。

yingyinNormal.en: You must have used a false name at the clinic and their tests probably tripped the monitor to your gene print.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你在诊所用的肯定是假名，他们的检查泄漏了你的基因讯息。

yingyinNormal.en: And then he compared those two genomes in software, and what he found, among other things, was a deletion, a 2,000-base deletion across three billion bases, right, in a particular gene called TP53.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他用软件对比两组基因组，他发现了30亿碱基里，有两千个碱基的丢失，这是在一个叫TP53的基因上。

yingyinNormal.en: And what they found was a series of mutations in a gene called SPR, which is responsible for producing serotonin, among other things.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们发现了SPR基因上的一个系列突变，这个片段与产生血清素的功能相关。

yingyinNormal.en: This redundancy is a good thing because you only need one functioning BRCA1 gene in a cell to regulate the cell cycle.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这种“多余”其实是件好事，因为你虽然只需要一个乳腺癌1号基因工作就能控制细胞周期。

yingyinNormal.en: And if you ask me, Tyler's just hiding at Whitmore, pretending everything's fine as if he can outrun his were wolf gene or something.
yingyinNormal.zh: 要我说，泰勒，只是躲在惠特莫，假装一切都好，好像这样就能摆脱他的狼人基因。

yingyinNormal.en: What if my mother has some sort of, like, nut gene that in combination with any man at all makes him go from "I do" to "What I do"?
yingyinNormal.zh: 万一我妈妈有着可以让任何一个男人从“我愿意”变成“我配不上你”的顽强基因呢？

yingyinNormal.en: But the gene that regulates that down is broken. And so this informs, among other things, of course, a treatment for bone marrow transplant, which he undertakes.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但这个基因的此种功能出现问题，所以对于这个问题他接受了骨髓移植的治疗。

yingyinNormal.en: Then, we gave her what we call ALZ-112, a gene therapy that allows the brain to create its own cells in order to repair itself.
yingyinNormal.zh: 之后我们给她用了叫ALZ112的药，这是一种基因疗法，促使大脑产生出新的脑细胞来完成自我修复。
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《Rise of the Planet of the Apes》

yingyinNormal.en: Gene, I want the same overcoat for Peter. I mean the exact same one that Obama wore, and Alicia, too.
yingyinNormal.zh: 吉恩，为彼得弄一件相同的大衣和奥巴马那件完全一样的大衣，艾丽西娅也要一件。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: The study also found that the <highlight>genes</highlight> for smell were something shared in friends but not <highlight>genes</highlight> for immunity.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 研究还发现朋友之间的嗅觉基因是一致的，但与免疫相关的基因却并非如此。

examination_example.sentence: For example, it is unclear whether the sequencing of a whole genome violates the patents of individual <highlight>genes</highlight> within it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 例如，对一个完整基因组进行排序是否会侵犯其内部单个基因所获得的专利，这一问题尚不明确。

examination_example.sentence: Companies had won patents for isolated DNA for decades — by 2005 some 20% of human <highlight>genes</highlight> were patented.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 数十年来，公司们一直在享有分离DNA的专利——截止到2005年，约有20%的人类基因已被申请专利。

word_usage.usage:
be in the genes表示“基因使然；……是遗传的”，如：
I've always enjoyed music—it's in the genes.
我向来喜欢音乐，这是受父母影响。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: It is not fully examined by <highlight>gene</highlight> scientists.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 基因科学家并没有对其进行全面检查。

examination_example.sentence: Something as complex as intellect is likely to be affected by many factors beyond <highlight>genes</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 像智力这样复杂的东西很可能会受到基因以外的许多因素的影响。

examination_example.sentence: Students' academic performance is determined by their <highlight>genes</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 学生的学习成绩是由基因决定的。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Genes</highlight> and the environment interact in many complex ways to shape individuals and guide their behavior, including their curiosity.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 基因和环境以许多复杂的方式相互作用，塑造个体，引导他们的行为，包括他们的好奇心。

examination_example.sentence: He points out that more than 200 <highlight>genes</highlight> influence weight.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他指出，有超过200种基因可以影响体重。

examination_example.sentence: It is destined to transform human <highlight>genes</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它注定会改变人类的基因。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: These <highlight>genes</highlight> were much more active when the men had fasted before exercise than when they had breakfasted.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当人们运动前禁食时，这些基因表现的比吃过早餐时更加活跃。

examination_example.sentence: Multiple <highlight>genes</highlight> behaved differently, depending on whether someone had eaten or not before walking.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 多种基因表现不同，这取决于一个人在走路前是否吃过东西。

examination_example.sentence: Many of these <highlight>genes</highlight> produce proteins that can improve blood sugar regulation and insulin levels throughout the body.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些基因中产生的蛋白质，可以改善整个身体的血糖调节和胰岛素水平。

examination_example.sentence: It depending on NASA HUNCH high school class, like the one science teachers <highlight>Gene</highlight> Gordon and Donna Himmelberg lead at Fairport High School.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这要靠参与NASAHUNCH项目的高中班级，比如Fairport高中的一个由科学教师吉恩·戈登和唐娜·希梅尔伯格带领的班级。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: It is because of small things called "<highlight>genes</highlight> (基因)" in our body.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是因为我们身体里有一种叫做“基因”的小东西。

examination_example.sentence: However，<highlight>genes</highlight> can't control everything，argues geneticist Danielle Reed，who also studies twins.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，同样研究双胞胎的遗传学家丹妮尔·里德认为，基因不能控制一切。

examination_example.sentence: Now scientists are discovering that the boundaries (界限) between <highlight>genes</highlight> and environment are not so clear.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 现在科学家们发现基因和环境之间的界限并不那么清晰。

examination_example.sentence: When I saw astronaut <highlight>Gene</highlight> Cernan walking on the Moon，I told myself，“I want to be an astronaut.”
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当我看到宇航员吉恩·塞尔南在月球上行走时，我告诉自己:“我想成为一名宇航员。”
